root: ^Scrawled Handwriting: I... I can't take it anymore. The tower's bright and inescapable light pierces me from all directions. The meteors are relentlessly barraging the platforms, preventing a clear path to walk upon.
^Scrawled Handwriting: Be quick, and don't look behind you. Ahead, I found a block that when placed on a switch, created a stairway to the exit.
